a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Birth and death rates in China and how they were affected by the
Great Leap Forward famine, China, 1949 to 2009
Both the birth and death rate are expressed per 1,000 of the population.
Data source: Brian Mitchell - International Historical Statistics
